Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Minor
b) Defect Observed: Weapon station electrical short. Malfunction reported by flight crew.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Manufacturing defect in material composition leading to premature failure
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Fire Control component. Physical
examination revealed signs of wear and degradation.
c) Remedial Measures Adjust calibration settings to manufacturer specifications
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Modify design to incorporate additional safety margin
d) Attributable Code: F - Failure/ageing/Corrosion/Material Failure
Remarks: Detailed examination conducted. Corrective measures implemented.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Investigation findings reviewed. Root cause analysis is acceptable. Recommend implementation of proposed corrective actions.
Date: 16/11/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Air Cmde S.B. Rao
